name: availability.toml
rawContent:
# Availability Entity
# Specialist availability slots

[entity]
id = "availability"
name = "Availability"
description = "A specialist's availability time slot"
table = "availabilities"

[[fields]]
name = "id"
type = "string"
format = "uuid"
required = true
unique = true
description = "Unique availability slot identifier"

[[fields]]
name = "specialistId"
type = "relation"
relatedEntity = "specialist"
required = true
description = "Specialist this availability belongs to"

[[fields]]
name = "date"
type = "datetime"
required = true
description = "Date of availability"

[[fields]]
name = "startTime"
type = "string"
format = "time"
required = true
description = "Start time"

[[fields]]
name = "endTime"
type = "string"
format = "time"
required = true
description = "End time"

[[fields]]
name = "isBooked"
type = "boolean"
default = false
required = true
description = "Whether this slot is booked"

[relations]
specialist = { entity = "specialist", type = "many-to-one", field = "specialistId" }

[implementation]
interface = "AvailabilityEntity"
file = "src/prototype/factories/index.ts"
mock = "src/prototype/mocks/availabilities.json"
status = "planned"
